name: GROW GROX
description:
I got to live in the world where I got abandoned by my teammates for this jam.

Trying to think what to do once alone, I thought my story was theme-fitting enough to try to make a game of, specially since at the time the pain made me think of "what would it be like if things weren't like this, if everything went right..."

Such is life, hope you enjoy this little thingy I made while in tears :'3 (literally)
